name: Magic: The Gathering Arena

task.description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks
wineexec
task.exclude_processes: mscorsvw.exe rundll32.exe rpcss.exe powershell.exe UnityCrashHandler32.exe svchost.exe MTGALauncher.exe MTGA.exe

content:
files:
- setup: https://mtgarena.downloads.wizards.com/Live/Windows32/MTGAInstaller.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Wizards of the Coast/MTGA/MTGALauncher/MTGALauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .NET 4.7.2. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact arial win10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing additional dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: GrabFullscreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: UseTakeFocus
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /Q
    description: Installing Magic the Gathering Arena ...
    exclude_processes: mscorsvw.exe rundll32.exe rpcss.exe powershell.exe UnityCrashHandler32.exe
      svchost.exe MTGALauncher.exe MTGA.exe
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
wine:
  version: lutris-mtga-4.21-x86_64
